mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT BRAND_NAME FROM VIEW_PRODUCT WHERE NOT BRAND_NAME IS NULL AND CATEGORY_CODE = 'RD' ORDER BY BRAND_NAME ASC
SELECT DISTINCT ROD_REEL_TYPE FROM VIEW_PRODUCT WHERE NOT ROD_REEL_TYPE IS NULL AND CATEGORY_CODE = 'RD' ORDER BY ROD_REEL_TYPE ASC
SELECT DISTINCT * FROM (SELECT TO_CHAR(LINE_MIN, 'FM9990.09') LINE_MIN FROM VIEW_PRODUCT WHERE NOT LINE_MIN IS NULL AND CATEGORY_CODE = 'RD' ORDER BY LINE_MIN ASC)
SELECT DISTINCT * FROM (SELECT TO_CHAR(LINE_MAX, 'FM9990.09') LINE_MIN FROM VIEW_PRODUCT WHERE NOT LINE_MAX IS NULL AND CATEGORY_CODE = 'RD' ORDER BY LINE_MIN ASC)
SELECT DISTINCT BRAND_NAME FROM VIEW_PRODUCT WHERE NOT BRAND_NAME IS NULL AND CATEGORY_CODE = 'RL' ORDER BY BRAND_NAME ASC
SELECT DISTINCT REEL_TYPE FROM VIEW_PRODUCT WHERE NOT REEL_TYPE IS NULL AND CATEGORY_CODE = 'RL' ORDER BY REEL_TYPE ASC
SELECT DISTINCT BRAND_NAME FROM VIEW_PRODUCT WHERE NOT BRAND_NAME IS NULL AND CATEGORY_CODE = 'LN' ORDER BY BRAND_NAME ASC
SELECT DISTINCT * FROM (SELECT TO_CHAR(LINE_SIZE, 'FM9990.09') LINE_MAX FROM VIEW_PRODUCT WHERE NOT LINE_SIZE IS NULL AND CATEGORY_CODE = 'LN' ORDER BY LINE_SIZE ASC)

SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.PRODUCT_NO ,A.BRAND_NAME ,A.PRODUCT_NAME ,CASE WHEN A.CATEGORY_CODE = 'RD' THEN A.BRAND_NAME WHEN A.CATEGORY_CODE = 'RL' THEN A.BRAND_NAME WHEN A.CATEGORY_CODE = 'LN' THEN A.BRAND_NAME END OPTION1 ,CASE WHEN A.CATEGORY_CODE = 'RD' THEN RD.REEL_TYPE WHEN A.CATEGORY_CODE = 'RL' THEN RL.REEL_TYPE WHEN A.CATEGORY_CODE = 'LN' THEN TO_CHAR(LN.LINE_SIZE, 'FM9990.09') END OPTION2 ,CASE WHEN A.CATEGORY_CODE = 'RD' THEN TO_CHAR(RD.LINE_MIN, 'FM9990.09') END OPTION3 ,CASE WHEN A.CATEGORY_CODE = 'RD' THEN TO_CHAR(RD.LINE_MAX, 'FM9990.09') END OPTION4 ,CASE WHEN A.CATEGORY_CODE = 'RD' THEN RD.ROD_PRICE WHEN A.CATEGORY_CODE = 'RL' THEN RL.REEL_PRICE WHEN A.CATEGORY_CODE = 'LN' THEN LN.LINE_PRICE END PRICE FROM VIEW_PRODUCT A LEFT JOIN T_ROD RD ON A.PRODUCT_NO = RD.PRODUCT_NO LEFT JOIN T_REEL RL ON A.PRODUCT_NO = RL.PRODUCT_NO LEFT JOIN T_LINE LN ON A.PRODUCT_NO = LN.PRODUCT_NO WHERE A.CATEGORY_CODE = #{categoryCode}) LIST

SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.PRODUCT_NO ,A.BRAND_NAME ,A.PRODUCT_NAME ,CASE WHEN A.CATEGORY_CODE = 'RD' THEN A.BRAND_NAME WHEN A.CATEGORY_CODE = 'RL' THEN A.BRAND_NAME WHEN A.CATEGORY_CODE = 'LN' THEN A.BRAND_NAME END OPTION1 ,CASE WHEN A.CATEGORY_CODE = 'RD' THEN RD.REEL_TYPE WHEN A.CATEGORY_CODE = 'RL' THEN RL.REEL_TYPE WHEN A.CATEGORY_CODE = 'LN' THEN TO_CHAR(LN.LINE_SIZE, 'FM9990.09') END OPTION2 ,CASE WHEN A.CATEGORY_CODE = 'RD' THEN TO_CHAR(RD.LINE_MIN, 'FM9990.09') END OPTION3 ,CASE WHEN A.CATEGORY_CODE = 'RD' THEN TO_CHAR(RD.LINE_MAX, 'FM9990.09') END OPTION4 ,CASE WHEN A.CATEGORY_CODE = 'RD' THEN RD.ROD_PRICE WHEN A.CATEGORY_CODE = 'RL' THEN RL.REEL_PRICE WHEN A.CATEGORY_CODE = 'LN' THEN LN.LINE_PRICE END PRICE FROM VIEW_PRODUCT A LEFT JOIN T_ROD RD ON A.PRODUCT_NO = RD.PRODUCT_NO LEFT JOIN T_REEL RL ON A.PRODUCT_NO = RL.PRODUCT_NO LEFT JOIN T_LINE LN ON A.PRODUCT_NO = LN.PRODUCT_NO WHERE A.CATEGORY_CODE = #{categoryCode}) LIST WHERE LIST.OPTION1 IN ( '${categoryOption}' ) OR LIST.OPTION2 IN ( '${categoryOption}' ) OR LIST.OPTION3 IN ( '${categoryOption}' ) OR LIST.OPTION4 IN ( '${categoryOption}' )
